Minister.Text: Leader of the Government in the House of Commons and Minister responsible for Democratic Reform

Item.Text: — ss. 1 to 5, 7, 8, 18 to 24.1 and 28 to 31 in force on assent 06.05.2004;
— s. 6 deemed in force 01.04.2003 see s. 32(1);
— s. 9 deemed in force 01.07.2003 see s. 32(2);
— ss. 10 to 17 and 25 to 27 repealed before coming into force 31.12.2018 see 2008, c. 20, s. 3 (Statutes Repeal Act)
